annotations:
FROM: ARYACORP PVT. LTD.
DATE & TIME: 28-08-2024 12:11:03   (GMT +5:30)
REFERΕNCE NO: 17756376
ATTN CHARTERING DESK
DEAR SIR
GOOD DAY
DIRECT OWNERS VESSEL
PLEASE ADVISE SUITABLE CARGO FOR BELOW VESSEL
MV SSI PRUDENT - SMX/UMX - OPEN DALIAN - 5 - 9 SEP
ROB : ABT  700 MTS VLSFO - ABT 170 MTS VLSMGO
MV SSI PRUDENT (IMO NO: 9927304)
DWT ABT 63,869 ON 13.50 M SSWD
BLT 2022 JINLING CHINA
GRT 35,846 / NRT 21,203
LOA 199.90M / BEAM 32.26 M / TPC 61.70
5 HO / 5 HA
CRANE: 4 X 30 MTS  IN HOOK MODE, 24 MTS IN GRAB MODE
GRAB:  4X12 CBM
GRAIN / BALE CAPACITY (CBM):
13,299.00 / 12,348.50
16,985.90 / 15,766.40
15,849.30 / 14,681.90
16,398.10 / 15,204.70
15,793.50 / 14,773.60
---------------------------------
TOTAL : 78,325.80 CBM / 72,775.10 CBM
SPEED / CONSUMPTION:
LADEN  : ABT 13.50 KTS ON ABT 23.50 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
BALLAST: ABT 14.00 KTS ON ABT 22.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED - WOG
LADEN  : ABT 12.50 KNOTS ON ABT 20.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
BALLAST: ABT 12.50 KNOTS ON ABT 17.00 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.1 MT MGO
PORT IDLE: ABT 3.0 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
PORT WORKING: ABT 4.5 MT VLSFO + ABT 0.2 MT LSMGO
+++
SPEED/CONSUMPTION BASED ON GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UPTO BEAUFORT SCALE 4 (MAX 16 KTS) AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (COMBINED SEA/SWELL/ MAXIMUM SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT OF 1.25 M) AND SMOOTH SEA, NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND/OR NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL, AND ALWAYS LOADED LESS THAN VESSEL'S MAX SUMMER LOADLINE, EVEN KEEL CONDITION AND ALWAYS EXCLUDING VOYAGES LESS THAN 48 HOURS TRANSIT TIME FROM SEA PILOT TO SEA PILOT, PASSAGES WITH RESTRICTED VISIBILITY,
CONGESTED WATERS, STRAITS, NARROWED WATERS AND WHILE MANEUVERING, ENTERING/LEAVING PORTS.
IN CASE OF HOT/COLD CLIMATES AN ADDITIONAL 1MT DAILY CONSUMPTION IS EXPECTED FOR MACHINERY COOLING, AND FUEL HEATING DEMANDS.
IF SEA WATER TEMPERATURE IS BELOW 15 DEGREE CELCIUS THERE WILL BE EXTRA BOILER CONSUMPTION.
PERIODS OF LESS THAN 24 HOURS, FROM NOON REPORT TO NOON REPORT, OF CONTINUOUS GOOD WEATHER TO BE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM DETERMINATION OF THE VESSEL'S PERFORMANCE. UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED BY OWNERS,
CHARTERERS MAY NOT DEDUCT OR SET-OFF AMOUNTS FROM HIRE PAYMENTS FOR SPEED AND/OR OVERCONSUMPTION CLAIMS.
VESSEL HAS LIBERTY TO CONSUME DIESEL OIL WHEN MANEUVERING, IN/OUT PORTS, STARTING OF A/E, IN THE BOLIER DURING PORT STAY, BURNING OF SLUDGE OIL IN INCINERATOR, NAVIGATING IN SHALLOW/RESTRICTED/BUSY/CONGESTED WATERS/CANALS/RIVERS/DURING PILOTAGE OR FOR SAFETY OF VESSEL DURING BAD WEATHER/FOG, ALWAYS UNDER DISCRETION OF THE MASTER
WEATHER ROUTING COMPANY CALCULATION FOR GOOD WEATHER DAYS SHALL BE ONLY APPLICABLE AND LIMITED FOR THE GOOD WEATHER DAYS ONLY AND CANNOT BE SPREAD ALL OVER THE ENTIRE VOYAGE.
THE VESSEL IS EQUIPPED WITH AN ELECTROLYSIS BWTS WHICH REQUIRES A MINIMUM LEVEL OF SALINITY TO OPERATE. IN CASES WHERE THE VESSEL WILL NEED TO TAKE ON OR DISCHARGE BALLAST IN A FRESH WATER PORT, THE VESSEL WILL BE REQUIRED TO TAKE ABOUT 200 MT SEA WATER IN THE AFT PEAK TANK. THIS MUST BE TAKEN ON BOARD PRIOR TO ARRIVAL AT THE PORT AND THE CARGO LIFT MAY BE CORRESPONDINGLY REDUCED AT CHARTERERS RISK AND EXPENSE.
OPL BUNKERING IS NOT ALLOWED.
-BUNKER QUALITY:
DURING CURRENCY OF THE CHARTER, BUNKERS  TO BE SUPPLIED SHALL BE IN ACCORDANCE WITH MIN ISO 8217:2017 SPECIFICATION OR ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
-VLSFO 380 CST: RMG 380 AS PER ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT: 0.5% PCT)
-LSMGO: DMA ISO 8217:2017-E (MAX SULPHUR CONTENT : 0.1% )
BOTH GRADES ALWAYS TO COMPLY WITH MARPOL 73/78 REQUIREMENTS, REG 14, 18 OF ANNEX VI AND ANY SUBSEQUENT AMENDMENTS THERETO.
DURING THE CURRENCY OF THIS CHARTER, CHARTERERS ARE ONLY PERMITTED TO SUPPLY ABOVE GRADES TO THE VESSEL.
VESSEL CAN ONLY BE BUNKERED UP TO 85 PCT OF TANK CAPACITY. COMINGLING OF DIFFERENT BUNKER STEMS NOT ALLOWED.
ALL DETAILS ARE ABOUT
PLSD TO HEAR.
BEST REGARDS,
Tonnage Desk:
PG-WCI-Rsea-Safr: Nitin Sharma | Mob: +91 9311255654  | Skype: mailto:acpl.nithin@outlook.com

AS BROKERS ONLY
As Agents for Core Shipping Ltd.
